text:
@SpeakerPelosi Speaker Pelosi, It looks like trump and Pence are playing games with the #coronavirus! If you don't test people the numbers of cases that are reported is kept low. Reality is lots of sick people are going undiagnosed and more than ever will die! We are scammed
#TrumpVirusCoverup https://t.co/nbq2iTq6ol
